name: Pirate & Pesherka
description:
If you always wondered what it's like to be a pirate, this game will give you the answers. Join Mr. Captain in his small adventure: avoid traps, defeat deadly foes, solve puzzles and reveal the mystery of the Pesherka cave!

CONTROLS

==============================================================

WASD  - Movement

Space - Attack

Q - Switch inventory items

Shift - Throw/Use item

E - Interact

F - Flashlight

==============================================================

Assets - https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/

Sounds - https://opengameart.org/
